entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GetPathRoot cannot handle UNC paths on unix. #109594
  • "Failed to load System.Private.CoreLib.dll (error code 0x80070002)" for self-contained binary #109593
  • [API Proposal]: Add StringBuilder overload for WebUtility.HtmlEncode #109591
  • MailAddress accepts invalid email address with consecutive dots #109590
  • Failing stepping when debugging managed code on Debug runtime #109589
  • Unexpected padding with Auto layout structs #109585
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: System.String.RSplit #109583
  • DnsAddresses throw PlatformNotSupportedException if /etc/resolv.conf is missing #109582
    Future
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/unittests/TryCatchInFinally/TryCatchInFinally.cmd #109574
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Unexpected exception type from X509Certificate2 .ctor #93676
    Future
  • Improve server GOAWAY exception message in HttpClient #1966
    Future
  • System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager nuget 8.0.1 contains diffferent assembly versions. #109581
  • How to remove request-id and traceparent Header from HttpClient Request #109558
  • More frequent timeout on outbound request after upgrading to .net 8 #108599
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/StructABI/EmptyStructs/EmptyStructs.cmd #109269
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix erroneous success in AsnDecoder.ReadEncodedValue #109597
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix erroneous success in AsnDecoder.ReadEncodedValue #109596
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix erroneous success in AsnDecoder.ReadEncodedValue #109595
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • JIT: Don't split up partially-hot call-finally pairs during 3-opt layout #109592
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [EventTrace] Update check for provider triggered GC #109587
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [WASI] debugger sockets #109584
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #109580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Release/8.0] Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #109579
    Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • fix for `MissingTestException` #109577
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix erroneous success in AsnDecoder.ReadEncodedValue #109586
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, 10.0.0
  • Report more details when dictionary layout missing #109576
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use type-level annotations for trimming/AOT analysis #109571
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-staging] handle case of Proc Index > MAX_SUPPORTED_CPUS #109386
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] handle case of Proc Index > MAX_SUPPORTED_CPUS #109385
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • Dedup remaining MemoryExtensions Span overloads #109501
    area-System.Memory
  • JIT: some deabstraction prerequisites #109575
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Haiku: Add Haiku support for CoreCLR/PAL #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • JIT: Fix codegen for misaligned double `STORE_LCL_FLD` on arm32 #109547
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix file name buffer size for PAL's CreateProcess #109436
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [ILASM] Add wrappers for platform-specific SHA-256 implementations #109559
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Add AOT annotations to System.Private.Xml and System.Data.Common #109528
    area-System.Xml
  • Block exporting DllMain #109545
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change iOS PEM searcher to use PemEncoding.TryFindUtf8 #109564
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2576705 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [release/8.0] Disable user mapper for SslStream on Windows (TLS 1.3) (#100833) #109116
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • Add `STJ.Nodes.JsonArray.Remove(All|Range)` #109472
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Simplify temporary keychain password-gen #109422
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add Span<byte> overloads for ProtectedData #109529
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0-staging] Switch to non-incremental servicing #109316
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.1
  • Convert dotnet/runtime to use the new Arcade tooling for RPMs #109526
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up code with `NET8_0_OR_GREATER` #109507
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Avoid IndexOutOfRangeException in ZipArchive #109168
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Encode missing tailcall in GC info #109512
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • LINQ GroupBy Grouping can use InlineArray for first elements to avoid allocations #108569
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Avoid generic virtual dispatch for frozen collections alternate lookup #108732
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [draft] New decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Give unique event ID to TRANSACTION_CREATED_OLETX_EVENTID #109138
    area-System.Transactions, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Remove the register tp from callee saved registers in coreclr. #108696
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
